Detailed Description

Class containing methods common to the GfxFeatureMapProcessor and the GfxTileFeatureMapProcessor.

Member Function Documentation

bool GfxFeatureMapProcBase::getDisplayClassForCC (  uint32  poiID,
uint8 &  displayClass
)  [protected]
 

Get the citycentre display class for the specified sql id.

Caches the found display classes.

Parameters:
sqlID The sql id.
displayClass [OUT] Will be set to display class if successful.
Returns:
True if the outparameter was succesfully set, i.e. a citycentre display class was found for the specified sql id.
